settings.title: Optimized for function, not flavor
settings.text: In collaboration with our board of medical professionals, we created pharmaceutical grade, comprehensive hydration supplements to restore electrolyte and mineral gaps in the American diet‚Äîstarting at the cellular level.

settings.title: üëÖ Purposefully Unflavored
settings.text:
Made without the sweet but inflammatory ingredients that lead to inflammation and chronic disease with long term use.

No sugar, stevia, dextrose, sweeteners, natural flavors, artificial ingredients or additives.

settings.title: üåä Real Sea Salt
settings.text:
We use harvested, not manufactured salt for cellular hydration.

Most electrolyte supplements use the cheaply manufactured sodium sources like sodium bicarbonate and sodium chloride, which are essentially baking soda and road salt.

Our salt is hand harvested from protected marine areas in the South of France and rich with hydrating electrolytes and trace minerals that work wonders for every cell and system.

settings.title: üí¶ 3x More Bioavailable Form
settings.text: Liquid form factors are up to 3x more bioavailable than powders and dissolving tablets for fast-acting hydration that works at the cellular level.

settings.title: ‚ú® 87 Ionic Trace Minerals
settings.text:
Modern agriculture and commercial water have stripped our soil and water of essential trace minerals, making them hard to find even in the most balance diets.

Even just minor deficiencies in these minerals can cause inabilities to absorb and use nutrients effectively. Every drop of Buoy contains 87 trace minerals preserved in their naturally ionic state for high bioavailability and fast absorption.

settings.title: With More Benefits In Every Drop

settings.text:
The average American‚Äôs salt intake comes from the processed and refined nutrient sparse sources found in table salt and other electrolyte supplements.

Proper sodium intake is at the core of hydration. Low or imbalanced electrolyte levels can present as feelings of anxiety, nervousness, sluggishness and brain fog.

We only use real sea salt so you can replenish adequately and effectively.

Modern agricultural practices and commercial water have depleted our soil and natural water sources of essential minerals, making them hard to find even in the healthiest diets.

These minerals are an overlooked necessity in daily hydration. Even minor deficiencies or inbalances can negatively impact our ability to absorb nutrients.

Buoy‚Äôs 87 Trace Minerals work to replenish and revitalize these deficiencies.

settings.title: Dr. Linali Li, Ph.D.
settings.title_location: President Gateway Pharmaceutical, St. Louis, Missouri
settings.content: ‚ÄúMost of us are living our lives under the optimal hydration level. Buoy gives consumers the proper hydration they need, without having to reach for a sugary, artificial sports drink.‚Äù

settings.title: Martha Rosenau
settings.content: ‚ÄúMy patients with gastrointestinal disease are truly benefiting from Buoy. They are feeling more vibrant and energetic with this amazing blend of electrolytes. Since it‚Äôs free of both sugars and zero-calorie sweetener, it‚Äôs the perfect way to rehydrate without further aggravating the gastrointestinal tract. Thank you for creating a dietitian‚Äôs dream - the perfectly balanced electrolyte replenisher, free of any form of sweetener.‚Äù

settings.title: Melissa Nohr, JD, BCHHP, CBNP
settings.content: ‚ÄúI was diagnosed with POTS a year ago and they make a point to help make daily hydration easier and more accessible to those with chronic illnesses. After using Buoy for one year as a customer, I asked to personally invest in the company.‚Äù

settings.text: BOARD OF HEALTH PROFESSIONALS
settings.sub-text: Consisting of scientists, researchers, pharmaceutical experts, and health professionals, our board of health professionals continue to challenge and uphold us and our products to the highest standards.
